DOC.brief_summary: The management poor responder patient difficult . Currently , standard treatment poor responder patient . The study design test modify GnRHa protocol poor ovarian response , low dose GnRHa early luteal phase regulation , compare GnRHa ultra-short protocol . This randomize controlled trial .
DOC.brief_title: Low Dose GnRHa Early Luteal Phase Down Regulation Versus GnRHa Ultra-short Protocol Poor Ovarian Response
DOC.criteria: At least two follow three feature must present : . Advanced maternal age ( ≥40 year ) risk factor POR ( poor ovarian response ) ; ii . A previous POR ( ≤3 oocytes conventional stimulation protocol ) ; iii . An abnormal ovarian reserve test ( i.e . AFC < 7 follicle AMH < 1.1 ng/ml ) . Contraindications IVF/ICSI Contraindications pregnancy Primary ovarian insufficiency AFC < 3 PGD/PGS
